root.name: Gem Miner
root.description: Developer description: Dig a mine to find ores, metals and gems and make your fortune! Buy upgrades from your profits and dig even deeper, whilst being careful not to get stuck down the mine, fall down chasms or be crushed by rockfalls! Two versions of the game are available, the free "Gem Miner" and the paid "Gem Miner: Dig Deeper". The paid version offers a bigger play area, more minerals and gems to collect as well as more items to buy.
